column2: the Fried Milk is what dreams are made of. When it came out
column3: it seemed diminutive and unimpressive-- chocolate and toasted milk with Captain Crunch as the topping?? However
column4: the second I broke into it & put it in my mouth
column5: O M G. Â If I had one last meal
column6: everything I ordered plus 2 orders of Fried Milk would be it.
